list_definition.definition: a person who works for a master to whom he belongs

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: In the nineteenth century many Africans were sold as slaves in the United States.

list_definition.mean_english: người làm việc đầu tắt, mặt tối
list_definition.definition: a person who works very hard for someone else

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a slave who types his letters and organizes his life for him.

list_definition.definition: to work very hard, often for another person

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ve been slaving away for you all day while you sit and watch television.
